title: Afghan Aubergine (Borani Banjan) With Saucy Spiced Lentils, Garlic Yoghurt, Fresh Mint & Pillowy Flatbreads

steps.label: Mix yoghurt, garlic, and lemon
steps.notes: Inferred for the garlic yoghurt topping. Ingredients include: soy yoghurt, lemon, garlic.

steps.label: Slice aubergine
steps.notes: Inferred from 'Crispy roasted aubergine'. The stated 'Prep time 1' is very short for all prep, so this is an estimate.

steps.label: Heat flatbreads
steps.notes: Inferred for serving with flatbreads. Best done towards the end of cooking.

steps.label: Preheat oven to 200°C
steps.notes: Inferred for roasting aubergine. Assuming a quick preheat to fit total time.

steps.raw_text: Chop onion and garlic, measure spices
steps.label: Chop onion and garlic, measure spices
steps.notes: Inferred for the lentil sauce base. Can be done while aubergine roasts.

steps.label: Chop fresh mint
steps.notes: Inferred for the fresh mint topping.

steps.label: Roast aubergine until crispy
steps.notes: Adjusted duration to fit the stated 'Total time 20' minutes. This is the main cooking step.

steps.label: Sauté onion, garlic, and spices
steps.notes: Inferred for building the sauce.

steps.raw_text: Add lentils, tomato, and sauce ingredients; simmer
steps.label: Add lentils, tomato, and sauce ingredients; simmer
steps.notes: Inferred for the lentil sauce. Assumes quick-cook or canned lentils to fit the total time. Ingredients include: black lentils, tomato, balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, agave nectar, tomato puree, sea salt, paprika, cumin, coriander, fennel, chilli, cinnamon, allspice.

steps.label: Assemble and serve
steps.notes: Serve roasted aubergine over lentil sauce, topped with garlic yoghurt and mint, with flatbreads.

title: Tandoori Tofu Naan Wraps With Cooling Mint Yoghurt, Pickled Red Cabbage & Fresh Spinach

steps.label: Cut Tofu into Bites
steps.notes: Dice or cube tofu into bite-sized pieces.

steps.label: Preheat Oven
steps.notes: Preheat oven to 200°C for roasting the tofu.

steps.label: Prepare Tandoori Marinade
steps.notes: Mix garlic, ginger, lemon juice, and spices (paprika, cumin, cayenne, coriander, turmeric, maple syrup, salt) for the tandoori marinade.

steps.label: Wash and Prep Spinach
steps.notes: Rinse and prepare fresh spinach leaves.

steps.label: Prepare Pickled Red Cabbage
steps.notes: Thinly slice red onion/cabbage and prepare a quick pickle with red wine vinegar, water, sugar, mustard seeds, fennel seeds, and coriander seeds.

steps.label: Prepare Mint Yoghurt
steps.notes: Chop fresh mint and mix with oat yoghurt for the cooling sauce.

steps.label: Marinate Tofu
steps.notes: Toss tofu in the prepared tandoori marinade. An estimated 15 minutes is used for marination, though longer is possible.

steps.label: Roast Tofu
steps.notes: Spread marinated tofu on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven until charred.

steps.label: Warm Naan
steps.notes: Warm the garlic and herb naan bread until soft and pliable. This can be done in the oven during the last few minutes of tofu roasting or immediately after.

steps.label: Assemble Wraps
steps.notes: Fill warm naan with roasted tandoori tofu, cooling mint yoghurt, tangy pickled red cabbage, and fresh spinach.

title: Creamy Kimchi Macaroni With Roasted Broccoli & Garlic Panko Breadcrumbs

steps.label: General Prep
steps.notes: Take out all ingredients and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.

steps.label: Preheat Oven
steps.notes: Preheat to 200°C (180°C fan).

steps.label: Chop Spring Onion
steps.notes: Finely chop spring onion, keep white half separate from green.

steps.label: Chop Kimchi
steps.notes: Chop vegan kimchi into smaller bite-sized pieces. Keep the juices.

steps.label: Boil Macaroni Pasta
steps.notes: Pour boiling water into saucepan, add macaroni pasta, salt water well. Boil for 8 minutes or until al dente.

steps.label: Dry Fry Garlic Breadcrumbs
steps.notes: Place frying pan over medium heat, dry fry (without oil) until lightly toasted.

steps.label: Prepare Broccoli for Roasting
steps.notes: Cut into bite-sized pieces, lay on tray, drizzle with olive oil, season.

steps.label: Scoop Pasta Water & Drain Macaroni
steps.notes: Scoop out a mug of pasta water, then drain and return the pasta to the pan.

steps.label: Roast Broccoli
steps.notes: Roast for 10-15 mins until golden, tossing once. Using midpoint duration.

steps.label: Combine Macaroni with Sauce & Kimchi
steps.notes: Add gochujang 'cheese' sauce, spring onion whites, and kimchi to the pot with the macaroni and stir to heat through.

steps.label: Adjust Sauce Consistency
steps.notes: Add a few splashes of reserved pasta water as needed to make the sauce silky.

steps.label: Add Roasted Broccoli to Macaroni
steps.notes: Add the cooked broccoli and stir again until just combined.

steps.label: Ladle Macaroni into Bowls
steps.notes: Ladle the creamy macaroni into bowls.

steps.label: Garnish Macaroni
steps.notes: Top with the crispy garlic breadcrumbs and the spring onion greens.

title: Peanut Butter Curry With Charred Red Peppers, Sugar Snap Peas, Lime & Toasted Peanuts

steps.label: Char Red Peppers
steps.notes: Inferred from 'charred red peppers'. Assumed oven broiler for charring. Peel and chop after charring (implied).

steps.label: Cook Basmati Rice
steps.notes: Assumed standard rice cooking time.

steps.label: Toast Peanuts
steps.notes: Inferred from 'toasted crushed peanuts'. Assumed dry pan toasting.

steps.label: Prepare Curry Aromatics
steps.notes: Chop/mince lemongrass, garlic, ginger, and measure spices (cumin, coriander, cloves, cinnamon, nutmeg).

steps.label: Prepare Potatoes & Sugar Snap Peas
steps.notes: Peel/chop new potatoes, trim sugar snap peas.

steps.label: Crush Toasted Peanuts
steps.notes: Requires peanuts to be toasted first.

steps.label: Sauté Curry Aromatics
steps.notes: Sauté prepared lemongrass, garlic, ginger, and spices.

steps.label: Simmer Curry Base
steps.notes: Add coconut milk, water, vegan bouillon, peanut butter, and soy sauce. Simmer gently to combine flavors.

steps.label: Add Vegetables to Curry
steps.notes: Add prepared potatoes, sugar snap peas, and charred red peppers. Cook until potatoes are tender.

steps.label: Squeeze Fresh Lime
steps.notes: Added just before serving for freshness.

steps.label: Serve Curry with Rice & Toppings
steps.notes: Plate curry with basmati rice, topped with crushed peanuts and a lime wedge.

title: Tahini Miso Ramen With Crispy Chilli Tempeh, Pak Choi & Flat Rice Noodles

steps.label: Take out all ingredients
steps.notes: Gather all necessary ingredients before starting.

steps.label: Gather cooking equipment
steps.notes: Take out a large frying pan and two saucepans.

steps.label: Rinse raw ingredients
steps.notes: Rinse any raw grains, herbs, or vegetables.

steps.label: Crumble tempeh
steps.notes: Crumble tempeh with hands until minced.

steps.label: Remove pak choi leaves
steps.notes: Remove pak choi leaves from the base of the stem.

steps.label: Dice chilli and spring onions
steps.notes: Finely dice chilli and spring onions (including green bits).

steps.label: Heat frying pan with oil
steps.notes: Place frying pan over high heat and add a generous drizzle of oil.

steps.label: Prepare miso tahini broth
steps.notes: Pour miso tahini broth into other saucepan and add 300ml of water.

steps.label: Prepare water for noodles
steps.notes: Pour boiling water from kettle into first saucepan and place over medium-high heat.

steps.label: Fry tempeh
steps.notes: Add crumbled tempeh and fry until crispy.

steps.label: Heat and simmer broth
steps.notes: Place over medium-high heat and bring to a boil, then reduce to a light simmer until ready to serve.

steps.label: Cook flat rice noodles
steps.notes: Cook for 4-5 minutes or until tender but al dente. Keep checking as rice noodles can be easily overcooked.

steps.raw_text: Stir in black bean rayu and keep warm
steps.label: Stir in black bean rayu and keep warm
steps.notes: Stir through half of the black bean rayu, then remove from pan and keep warm.

steps.label: Drain and rinse noodles
steps.notes: Drain and rinse well under cold running water, then leave in a colander to drain.

steps.label: Clean frying pan
steps.notes: Wipe clean the same frying pan used for tempeh.

steps.label: Cook pak choi
steps.notes: Add pak choi and cook until tender. This can be done while serving.

steps.raw_text: Top with pak choi and tempeh
steps.label: Top with pak choi and tempeh
Garnish ramen
steps.notes: Garnish with chilli, spring onions, and a drizzle of remaining black bean rayu.

title: Adobo Black Bean Tostadas With Shredded Lettuce, Lime Cashew Crema, Avocado & Salsa Macha

steps.label: Shred lettuce
steps.notes: Finely shred the baby gem by cutting horizontally across the head.

steps.label: Slice avocado
steps.notes: De-stone and cut into thin slices. Option to fan for presentation.

steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Preheat oven to 200°C / 180°C fan.

steps.label: Take out and rinse ingredients
steps.notes: Take out all ingredients and rinse any raw grains, herbs, or vegetables.

steps.label: Bake tostadas
steps.notes: Pop tacos onto a baking tray and bake for 8 minutes or until crispy, flipping halfway. This is the healthier, oil-free version.

steps.raw_text: Warm black beans with adobo sauce
steps.label: Warm black beans with adobo sauce
steps.notes: Place over medium heat and warm through, stirring occasionally, until piping hot. Add a splash of water if it starts to stick.

steps.raw_text: Mash half of the black beans
steps.label: Mash half of the black beans
steps.notes: Roughly mash around half of the beans with a fork and set aside.

steps.label: Assemble tostadas
steps.notes: Layer black beans, shredded lettuce, cashew crema, avocado slices, and salsa macha. Finish with a squeeze of fresh lime juice.

title: Mushroom Birria Tacos With Melted Vegan Mozzarella, Onion Salsa & Rich Dipping Consommé

steps.label: Sauté aromatics for consommé
steps.notes: Sauté red onion and garlic until softened and fragrant.

steps.label: Shred oyster mushrooms
steps.notes: Shred oyster mushrooms into bite-sized pieces, mimicking pulled meat texture.

steps.label: Prepare onion, coriander, lime salsa
steps.notes: Finely chop white onion and coriander, then mix with fresh lime juice to create a vibrant salsa.

steps.label: Warm tortillas
steps.notes: Warm corn tortillas until pliable and slightly toasted.

steps.label: Rehydrate dried chillies
steps.notes: Rehydrate chipotle, chilli de arbol, and guajillo chillies in hot water until softened.

steps.label: Blend consommé base
steps.notes: Blend rehydrated chillies, sautéed aromatics, tomato puree, vegan bouillon, and spices (cloves, cumin, oregano, cinnamon, allspice, bay leaf) with water until smooth.

steps.label: Simmer consommé
steps.notes: Slow-cook the blended consommé base to develop rich, deep flavors. This will be used for mushroom marinade and dipping.

steps.label: Marinate shredded mushrooms
steps.notes: Marinate shredded mushrooms in a portion of the finished consommé for flavor absorption.

steps.label: Cook marinated mushrooms
steps.notes: Sauté or cook the marinated mushrooms until tender and slightly browned.

steps.label: Assemble birria tacos
steps.notes: Dip warm tortillas in the consommé, then fill with cooked mushrooms and vegan mozzarella.

steps.label: Fry birria tacos
steps.notes: Fry the assembled tacos until crispy and the vegan mozzarella is melted and gooey.

steps.label: Serve birria tacos
steps.notes: Serve the fried birria tacos immediately with the fresh onion salsa and a side of warm consommé for dipping.
